00033 class QIconView;
00034 class QIconViewItem;
00035 
00036 // forward declaration of the KlustersDoc class
00037 class KlustersDoc;
00038 
00046 class ClusterPalette : public QVBox
00047 {
00048     Q_OBJECT
00049     
00050 public:
00058      ClusterPalette(QColor backgroundColor,QWidget* parent = 0,KStatusBar * statusBar = 0, const char* name = 0, WFlags fl = 0 );
00059    /*
00060    *  Destroys the object and frees any allocated resources.
00061    */
00062    ~ClusterPalette();
00063 
00064     //Mode of action, in immediate the change of color
00065     //and the selection of cluster is immediately trigger
00066     enum Mode {IMMEDIATE = 1, DELAY = 2};
00067     
00068     virtual void createClusterList(KlustersDoc* doc);
00069     virtual void updateClusterList();
00070     void selectItems(QValueList<int> selectedClusters);
00071     virtual inline void setImmediateMode(){mode = IMMEDIATE;};
00072     virtual inline void setDelayMode(){mode = DELAY;};
00073     virtual void reset();
00075     QValueList<int> selectedClusters();
00076 
00078       void hideUserClusterInformation();
00079       
00083       void showUserClusterInformation(int electrodeGroupId);
00084 
00086     void changeBackgroundColor(QColor color){
00087      backgroundColor = color;
00088      int h;
00089      int s;
00090      int v;
00091      color.hsv(&h,&s,&v);
00092      if(s <= 80 && v >= 240 || (s <= 40 && v >= 220)) iconView->setPaletteForegroundColor(black);
00093      else iconView->setPaletteForegroundColor(white);      
00094      iconView->setPaletteBackgroundColor(color);
00095      
00096      //get the list of selected clusters
00097      QValueList<int> selected = selectedClusters();
00098      
00099      //Set isInSelectItems to true to prevent the emission of signals due to selectionChange
00100      isInSelectItems = true;
00101 
00102      //Redraw the icons
00103      updateClusterList();
00104      
00105      //reselect the clusters
00106      selectItems(selected);
00107      
00108      //reset isInSelectItems to false to enable again the the emission of signals due to selectionChange
00109      isInSelectItems = false;
00110 
00111      update(); 
00112     }
00113 
00114 public slots:
00115     virtual void changeColor(QIconViewItem* item);
00116     virtual void moveClustersToNoise();
00117     virtual void moveClustersToArtefact();
00118     virtual void groupClusters();
00119     virtual void updateClusters();
00120 
00121 protected slots:
00125     virtual void slotRightPressed(QIconViewItem* item);
00126     virtual void slotMousePressed(int button,QIconViewItem* item);
00127     virtual void slotClickRedraw();
00128     virtual void languageChange();
00133       virtual void slotOnItem(QIconViewItem* item);
00134     
00135 signals:
00136     void singleChangeColor(int selectedCluster);
00137     void updateShownClusters(QValueList<int> selectedClusters);
00138     void groupClusters(QValueList<int> selectedClusters);
00139     void moveClustersToNoise(QValueList<int> selectedClusters);
00140     void moveClustersToArtefact(QValueList<int> selectedClusters);
00141     
00142 
00143 private:
00144     QIconView* iconView;
00145     KlustersDoc* doc;
00146 
00147     Mode mode;//default IMMEDIATE
00148 
00150     bool isInSelectItems;
00151 
00153     bool isUpToDate;
00154     
00156     QColor backgroundColor;
00157 
00159       KStatusBar* statusBar;
00160 
00162       bool isInUserClusterInfoMode;
00163 
00164 };
